attr.title: Bones in the Boneyard
attr.desc: There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them, and line up complete skeletons to set them free.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://jdmgames.itch.io/bones-in-the-boneyard). Extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://jdmgames.itch.io/bones-in-the-boneyard). Extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
